name: Delta ARC - Beginnings (Demo)
description: Fly through the skies of Neon City to fight against the evil Kitou Syndicate! In this vertical scrolling shoot-em-up you take control of Amaya Sasaki, a rookie operative for ARC -- the Absolute Retaliation Corps, who strive to defeat the tyrant magnate Takamaru Kitou. Use your rapid fire guns as well as the powerful Repulsor Cannon to destroy legions of drones and drop ships that stand between you and victory. Features a cyberpunk aesthetic and synthwave soundtrack composed by yours truly.
